Quizzinga.name: CRYPTEX
Quizzinga.description: Cryptex is an online quiz competition with a format similar to a treasure hunt. Each participant has to register individually and go through all the levels before being crowned as the winner. The questions will be diverse and will include all forms of genres .

Quizzinga.name: IPL Auction
Quizzinga.description: The IPL Auction simulates the pre-season player auction. Two rounds a cricket quiz and a subsequent auction determine team composition. Shortlisted teams, based on quiz scores, bid on players.

Quizzinga.name: BRANDWAGON
Quizzinga.description: Brandwagon is Quizzinga's flagship business quiz which takes place every year during Plinth. It will be held in two rounds. First is the written round and six highest scoring teams will move on to the finals.

E Cell.name: Pitch On The Rocks
E Cell.description: Welcome to 2025's Ideathon: The gateway to launching your idea! Pitch your startup ideas to industry experts and investors for a chance to secure seed funding, mentorship, and special awards. Our panel includes angel investors, PhDs, and MBA executives across various industries. The gateway to launching your idea.

DebSoc.name: THE LNMIIT MUN 25'
DebSoc.description: Get Ready for LNMIIT MUN '25! Step into the world of diplomacy and debate at LNMIIT MUN 2025! Represent a country, tackle global issues, draft resolutions, and negotiate alliances. Meet students from diverse backgrounds, develop public speaking and negotiation skills, and experience diplomacy in action. Join us at LNMIIT MUN 2025, where ideas meet action!

DebSoc.name: Change My Mind
DebSoc.description: Flip Our Perspective at, Change My Mind! Think you can change our mind? Test your debating skills at Change My Mindâ€”an interactive event with debate spots set up around campus! Challenge our members on controversial (and some downright hilarious) topics, and see if you've got the wit and arguments to sway opinions. Don't just talkâ€”convince! Ready to take on the challenge?

Astronomy.name: Brahmaand: The Space Ideathon
Astronomy.description: Brahmaand, a ideathon where participants solve cosmic riddles & build up earth-shattering ideas is hereðŸ’«. The solution to the problem statement will be presented before the quick witted judges who decide upon the winners worthy of the celestial crown and much-deserved bragging rights.

Astronomy.name: Starpix: The Astrophotography Competition
Astronomy.description: Get ready for 'Starpix'â€”a night of capturing space with your lens! ðŸŒŒâœ¨ Bring your camera, and let's capture the beauty of the night sky together. ðŸ“¸âœ¨Let your inner artist out with those amazing astrophotographs! From twinkling stars and planets to cool constellations, Turn the night sky into a masterpiece. Join us at 'Starpix' in Plinth 2025! ðŸŒ ðŸ“·

Astronomy.name: Astromemia: Astronomy themed meme making competition
Astronomy.description: Hear ye hear ye all self-proclaimed memelordsðŸ—¿! ASTROMEMIA, presented by the Astronomy Club of LNMIIT, is calling all cosmic comedians to a meme duel the internet's never seen! Bombard @astronomylnmiit with the galactic meme you're proud of having conjured.ðŸ’«What do the winners get? A chance to forever be immortalised in the 'meme hall of fame' and maybe even get their hands on a cool prize ðŸ¤©

Astronomy.name: Dhoomketu: Jamming and Stargazing session
Astronomy.description: Jamming under the stars with @capriccio.lnmiit the music club of lnmiit! ðŸŽ¶ Join us after pronite for a celestial experience in the library lawn. Feel the rhythm while gazing through telescopes at the mesmerizing night sky. Sing your heart out! ðŸŽ™ðŸŽµ Feel the beat! under the starry night sky! ðŸŒŒ Gaze the night sky through telescopes!ðŸ”­

Phoenix.name: Robowars
Phoenix.description: Get ready for an epic clash of machines! Watch as robots go head-to-head in an arena of chaos. Will your creation dominate the battlefield, or will it crumble under pressure?

Phoenix.name: ROBOCUP
Phoenix.description: To bring the raw energy of football and the marvel of mechanical engineering together, Plinth is excited to announce Robocup, a football tournament where the participating players are none other than robots. Build and program your own robots to take on the competition in a game that combines strategy, technology, and pure athleticism. Register now and join us for this exciting event where you will have the chance to be a part of a unique and cutting-edge competition!

Phoenix.name: ROBORACE
Phoenix.description: Get ready for the ultimate test of speed, precision, and cutting-edge technology in Velocity Vanguards - Robo Race. This thrilling event challenges participants to design and unleash their high-speed robotic vehicles on the track, competing for supremacy in a race that merges engineering prowess and artificial intelligence.

Phoenix.name: MOTOBOAT
Phoenix.description: Dive into the world of innovation and speed with "Moto Boat", the Motor Boat Challenge that invites participants to design, build, and race their motorized boats. This electrifying event combines engineering process, aquatic finesse, and adrenaline-pumping speed in a competition that celebrates the spirit of marine technology.

Phoenix.name: LNM TECH EXPO
Phoenix.description: The future is now! Come and experience the latest in robotics technology at our upcoming EXPO. You'll see robots of all shapes and sizes, performing tasks that were once thought to be the exclusive domain of humans. From delicate surgery to heavy-duty manufacturing, robots are changing the way we live and work.

Phoenix.name: ROBO TRANSPORTER
Phoenix.description: Welcome to "Transporter", an exhilarating robotics competition that challenges participants to design and build autonomous transport systems. In this cutting-edge event, teams will showcase their engineering process by creating robots capable of navigating complex terrains, overcoming obstacles, and efficiently transporting objects from one point to another..

Phoenix.name: Maze Solver
Phoenix.description: In this electrifying competition, teams of tech wizards will pit their robots against a mind-boggling maze. The robots will have to navigate their way through a series of obstacles and challenges, using sensors, algorithms, and sheer robotic prowess to reach the finish line first.

Phoenix.name: RC Plane
Phoenix.description: 'The engine is the heart of the airplane , but the pilot is its soul.' - Walter Releigh Ever dreamt of being a pilot? If yes , the time has come to live up to your dreams as 'Phoenix'- The Robotics Club of LNMIIT brings to you a chance to build your own plane and make it rip through the air. Enter the airfield and emerge as the best at the end of three rounds.

Phoenix.name: DRONE RACING
Phoenix.description: Greetings Airmasters !!! Does your winged friend have the ability to emerge out as the best amongst all? The time has now arrived to showcase the speed of your drone. Use all your skills to design a racing drone and make it fly through the crossline without crashing. Make your way to the airfield and let your drone do the talking

Phoenix.name: MICRO MOUSE
Phoenix.description: 'The engine is the heart of the airplane , but the pilot is its soul.' - Walter Releigh Ever dreamt of being a pilot? If yes , the time has come to live up to your dreams as 'Phoenix'- The Robotics Club of LNMIIT brings to you a chance to build your own plane and make it rip through the air. Enter the airfield and emerge as the best at the end of three rounds.

Coding.name: IUPC
Coding.description: Gear up for Cybros' thrilling ICPC-style contestâ€”a high-energy competition featuring teams of three! With a rigorous five-hour format, you'll tackle a set of challenging problems, putting your coding skills, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities to the ultimate test. Join us for an intense experience where strategy and collaboration pave the way to victory. Get ready to compete, conquer, and showcase your talents.

Coding.name: ENIGMA
Coding.description: Get ready for Cybros' flagship eventâ€”a Division 2-style individual coding contest designed to challenge and inspire. This two-hour competition brings together the best coders, all competing solo for a chance to claim top honors and win from an impressive prize pool. It's your time to shine, test your skills, and push your limits in this exciting, high-stakes event. May the best coder win!

Coding.name: CP Duels
Coding.description: Challenge your friends to a coding problem duel and see who can outsmart and outcode the other! Dive into a thrilling race against the clock, where each second counts as you tackle complex problems and push your competitive programming skills to the limit. CP Duels bring the excitement of head-to-head coding battlesâ€”think fast, debug faster, and claim victory by being the first to solve the toughest challenges. Are you ready to prove who's the ultimate coder? Let the duels begin!

Coding.name: Coding Cascade
Coding.description: Get ready for Coding Cascade, a high-stakes team coding event like no other! In this unique challenge, three questions are designed for three team members, where each question's output becomes the next question's input. The pressure is on, as success depends on flawless coordinationâ€”if the first coder falters, the entire team faces a cascading failure. With each member carrying a vital piece of the solution, teamwork, precision, and problem-solving skills are key to conquering the cascade. Rally your team and dive into the ultimate test of synchronized coding!

Coding.name: Alice, Bob, GO!
Coding.description: After tackling countless Alice and Bob game theory problems, have you ever wondered what it would be like to play them in real life? Now's your chance! We've crafted an experience that brings these classic logic battles to life. Dive into our interactive games, where you can step into the shoes of Alice and Bob, test your strategy, and experience the thrill of competitive decision-making firsthand. Get ready to think, strategize, and enjoy the very games you've only solved on paper!
